sport_ideas.title: Football
sport_ideas.description: Football is a team sport played between two teams of eleven players with a spherical ball. The ball is kicked with the foot to score a goal. Goals are scored by the team with the ball in its centre. The team with the most goals at the end of the game wins.

sport_ideas.title: Basketball
sport_ideas.description: Basketball is a team sport played between two teams of five players on a rectangular court. The objective of the game is to shoot a ball through a hoop set at the centre of the court. The team with the most points at the end of the game wins.

sport_ideas.title: Baseball
sport_ideas.description: Baseball is a bat-and-ball game played between two teams of nine players each, who take turns batting and fielding. The aim is to score runs by hitting the ball with a bat with the right hand, called a strike. The team with the most runs at the end of the game wins.

sport_ideas.title: Tennis
sport_ideas.description: Tennis is a racket sport that can be played individually against a single opponent (singles) or between two teams of two players each (doubles). Each player uses a tennis racket that is strung with cord to strike a hollow rubber ball covered with felt over a net.
